name: ITP046 - ALER 3 Fuel & Generator install
template name: FH-ZU2-QU-ITP046 - ALER 3 Fuel & Generator install - Rev 0

name: 1.0 - Preliminary Activities – Permits, Documentation, Approvals, Survey Documentation
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
— using the correct and complete set of drawings.
— all drawings are the latest revision.
Record of conformity - Drawings and drawing registers
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
Acceptance Criteria - All necessary measures and controls being implemented, that is PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP.
Reference Documents - PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Check survey to be completed of all footing positions prior to placing any of the components.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed Survey Report
○ Items to include but not limited to:
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA-001-SPC-00005-C2100 - ELECTRICAL SERVICES - GENERAL Drawings AS 1692, AS 1940:2017 and AS 1692:2006
Acceptance Criteria - Submission and approval of documentation based on the Temporary Design Process Matrix
Record of conformity - As defined by the Temporary Works Design Process Matrix (where applicable)
○ Inspection and attendance on site for Factory Acceptance Testing for:
○ Following these inspections FAT testing shall be submitted.
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Factory Acceptance Tests
Acceptance Criteria - Inspection of materials whilst still loaded on the truck prior to accepting the delivery on site.
○ Identify any damage/defects prior to unloading of the material.
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed, Materials Inspection Checklist on Conqa
2.2 - Inspection of Pipes, Transition Pits, Pits, Conduits, Slabs, and Structure
Acceptance Criteria - Generator/Fuel Contractor to inspect builder’s trench to confirm suitability and as per design
○ Generator/Fuel Contractor to install pipes, pits and conduits as per approved design.
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed
2.2 - Lifting Preparation (900KVA Generator, 1000L Fuel Tank and 20000L Fuel Tank)
Acceptance Criteria - Complete Pre-Lift/s Commencement Checklist prior to each component being lifted.
○ Ensure relevant drawings, lifting & fixing plans available to the crew.
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005 Drawings Lifting Plan
Record of conformity - Pre-Lift/s Commencement Checklist This ITP Signed
Acceptance Criteria - Survey to confirm component placement as per the design.
○ Install all fixings as per the drawings & engineers plan and suppliers’ specification.
○ Ensuring the generator is placed on waffle mats for vibration dampening purposes and aligned properly with the radiator duct & exhaust outlet.
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005 Drawings Lifting Plan
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Subcontractor ITP
○ Installation to include but not limited to:
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005 Drawings, Manufacturers Specification
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Factory Acceptance Tests, Subcontractor ITP
○ Installation to include but not limited to:
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005 Drawings, Manufacturers Specification
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Factory Acceptance Tests, Subcontractor ITP
Acceptance Criteria - Fuel lines are to be connected between the generator and fuel cell(s) and terminated in their final positions.
○ Ensure bend radius, connections etc are all as per manufacturers specification.
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Subcontractor ITP
○ Fuel lines are to be pressure tested to ensure there are no leaks or weak points prior to any fuel being introduced into the system.
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Test results, Subcontractor ITP
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
